>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a Recurring Consent.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Payload for Recurring Consent.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["clientRequestId","authorizationServerId","redirectUrl","loggedUser","creditors","recurringConfiguration","metadata"],"type":"object","properties":{"clientRequestId":{"description":"Unique identifier provided by the client. Used as idempotency and response correlation.","type":"string"},"authorizationServerId":{"description":"Openbanking Authorization Server Id corresponding to the ASPSP (Account Servicing Payment Service Provider).","type":"string"},"redirectUrl":{"description":"URL that the user will be redirected to, after approving/rejecting the consent in  the ASPSP. This URL must be registered in the 'Redirect Callback Url' API.","type":"string"},"loggedUser":{"required":["identification","type"],"type":"object","properties":{"identification":{"description":"Official identification document number","type":"string"},"type":{"description":"Document Type: \r\n\r\nCPF (Registration of natural person).","enum":["CPF"],"type":"string","title":"ObkLoggedUserDocumentType"}},"additionalProperties":false,"title":"ObkLoggedUserDocument"},"businessEntity":{"required":["identification","type"],"type":"object","properties":{"identification":{"description":"Official identification document number","type":"string"},"type":{"description":"Document Type: \r\n\r\nCNPJ (Registration of legal entity).","enum":["CNPJ"],"type":"string","title":"ObkBusinessEntityDocumentType"}},"additionalProperties":false,"title":"ObkBusinessEntityDocument"},"creditors":{"type":"array","items":{"properties":{"personType":{"description":"Types of person","enum":["NATURAL_PERSON","LEGAL_ENTITY"],"type":"string","title":"ObkPersonType"},"cpfCnpj":{"description":"Creditor's official identification document number","type":"string"},"name":{"description":"Name of creditor","type":"string"}}},"title":"ObkRecCreditors"},"startDateTime":{"description":"Date and time at which the consent will become valid. Format: RFC-3339 specification, UTC.","type":"string"},"expirationDateTime":{"description":"Date and time at which the consent will cease to be valid. Format: RFC-3339 specification, UTC.","type":"string"},"additionalInformation":{"description":"Additional information on the consent. Must be completed whenever the user enters any additional information in the consent.","type":"string"},"debtorAccount":{"required":["accountType","ispb","number"],"type":"object","properties":{"ispb":{"description":"ISPB (Brazilian Payments System Identifier) of the SPI (Instant Payments System) participant with numbers only.","type":"string"},"issuer":{"nullable":true,"description":"Account issuing agency code without digit. Required for the following account types: CACC, SVGS.","type":"string"},"number":{"description":"Paying user's transaction account number, with a check digit (if it exists), if there is an alphanumeric value, it must be converted to 0.","type":"string"},"accountType":{"description":"Types of accounts: \r\n\r\nCACC (Current Account).\r\n SVGS (Savings Account).\r\nTRAN (Transacting Account - Prepaid Payment Account)","enum":["CACC","SVGS","TRAN"],"type":"string","title":"ObkAccountType"}},"additionalProperties":false,"title":"ObkDebtorAccount"},"recurringConfiguration":{"description":"The configuration for this recurring consent. One of the objects must be informed.","type":"object","properties":{"sweeping":{"description":"Configuration of recurrence for automatic fund transfers.","type":"object","properties":{"totalAllowedAmount":{"format":"int64","description":"The maximum amount, in cents, for the sum of all payments created with this consent.","type":"integer"},"transactionLimit":{"format":"int64","description":"The maximum amount, in cents, for each individual payment created with this consent.","type":"integer"},"periodicLimits":{"description":"Configuration of periodic limits for this recurring consent.","type":"object","properties":{"day":{"description":"Daily limit of payments for this consent. At least one of the fields must be informed.","type":"object","allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"quantityLimit":{"description":"The maximum quantity of payments for this period.","type":"integer"},"transactionLimit":{"format":"int64","description":"The maximum amount, in cents, for the sum of all payments created in this period.","type":"integer"}},"title":"ObkRecurringConfigurationLimit"},{"type":"object"}],"title":"ObkRecurringConfigurationLimitDay"},"week":{"description":"Weekly limit of payments for this consent. At least one of the fields must be informed.","type":"object","allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"quantityLimit":{"description":"The maximum quantity of payments for this period.","type":"integer"},"transactionLimit":{"format":"int64","description":"The maximum amount, in cents, for the sum of all payments created in this period.","type":"integer"}},"title":"ObkRecurringConfigurationLimit"},{"type":"object"}],"title":"ObkRecurringConfigurationLimitWeek"},"month":{"description":"Monthly limit of payments for this consent. At least one of the fields must be informed.","type":"object","allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"quantityLimit":{"description":"The maximum quantity of payments for this period.","type":"integer"},"transactionLimit":{"format":"int64","description":"The maximum amount, in cents, for the sum of all payments created in this period.","type":"integer"}},"title":"ObkRecurringConfigurationLimit"},{"type":"object"}],"title":"ObkRecurringConfigurationLimitMonth"},"year":{"description":"Yearly limit of payments for this consent. At least one of the fields must be informed.","type":"object","allOf":[{"type":"object","properties":{"quantityLimit":{"description":"The maximum quantity of payments for this period.","type":"integer"},"transactionLimit":{"format":"int64","description":"The maximum amount, in cents, for the sum of all payments created in this period.","type":"integer"}},"title":"ObkRecurringConfigurationLimit"},{"type":"object"}],"title":"ObkRecurringConfigurationLimitYear"}}}}}},"title":"ObkRecurringConfiguration"},"metadata":{"required":["platform","os","osVersion"],"type":"object","description":"User metadata.","properties":{"platform":{"description":"User device Platform.","type":"string","enum":["BROWSER","APP"]},"os":{"description":"User device Operational System.","type":"string","enum":["ANDROID","IOS","WINDOWS","LINUX","MACOS","UNIX","OTHER"]},"osVersion":{"description":"User device Operational System's Version.","type":"string"}},"title":"ObkMetadata"},"tags":{"description":"Tags that can be sent by the client, it will be saved on the Entity, use as a metadata field","type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"example":["tag1","tag2"],"title":"Tags"}},"title":"ObkRecRecurringConsentRequest"}}},"required":true}}

</RequestSchema>
